title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews, analyze existing systems, and document functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, and data flow. Define the integration approach with existing CCTV infrastructure. Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and ethical guidelines for facial recognition technology. Particular attention should be paid to data security, access controls, and auditing mechanisms to prevent misuse and protect individual privacy rights.

title: Facial Recognition Algorithm Development
description: Research and develop robust facial recognition algorithms, considering factors like lighting conditions, angles, and occlusions.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a scalable database to store and manage facial recognition data, including images, metadata, and associated information.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Develop a user-friendly interface for monitoring, searching, and analyzing facial recognition data. Implement visualization tools for tracking individuals across multiple cameras.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement robust security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with privacy regulations. Conduct security audits and vulnerability assessments.

title: Integration and Deployment
description: Integrate the facial recognition system with existing CCTV infrastructure. Develop deployment strategies and automate the deployment process.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute tests at various levels, including unit, integration, and system testing. Ensure the system meets performance, accuracy, and reliability requirements.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user manuals, technical specifications, and maintenance guides. Develop training materials and conduct training sessions for system operators and administrators.
